javadoc:
Event for notifying plugins when the program view changes (what the
 Code Browser shows in the listing window).

methods.name: <init>

params.name: source
params.comment: name of the plugin that created this event

params.name: treeName
params.comment: name of the tree in the program

params.name: viewSet
params.comment: set of addresses in the view

methods.javadoc: Get the name of the tree where the view is from.
methods.name: getTreeName
methods.comment: Get the name of the tree where the view is from.

methods.javadoc: Get the address set in the view.
methods.name: getView
methods.comment: Get the address set in the view.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a string for debugging purposes.
@see java.lang.Object#toString()
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a string for debugging purposes.

name: ViewChangedPluginEvent
comment:
Event for notifying plugins when the program view changes (what the
 Code Browser shows in the listing window).
